juzs.text: 78|1|tara eke an'yera kache ki bisaye jijnasabada karache
78|2|mahasambadatira bisaye [1]
78|3|ye bisaye tara matanaikya karache [1]
78|4|kakhano na [1], tara acire'i janate parabe
78|5|tarapara bali kakhano na, tara acire'i janate parabe.
78|6|Amara ki karini yaminake sayya
78|7|ara parbatasamuhake pereka
78|8|ara amara srsti karechi tomaderake joraya joraya
78|9|ara tomadera ghumake karechi bisraama [1]
78|10|ara karechi ratake abarana
78|11|ara karechi dinake jibika aharanera samaya
78|12|ara amara nirmana karechi tomadera upare sudrrha sata akasa [1]
78|13|ara amara srsti karechi projjbala dipa [1].
78|14|Ara amara barsana karechi meghamala hate pracura bari [1]
78|15|yate ta dbara amara utpanna kari sasya, udbhida
78|16|o ghana sannibista udyana.
78|17|Niscaya nirdharita ache bicara dina [1]
78|18|sedina singaya phumka deya habe takhana tomara dale dale asabe [1]
78|19|ara akasa unmukta kara habe, phale ta habe bahu dbarabisista [1].
78|20|Ara calamana kara habe parbatasamuhake, phale segulo haye yabe maricika [1]
78|21|niscaya jahannama ot pete apeksamana
78|22|simalanghanakaridera jan'ya pratyabartanasthala.
78|23|Sekhane tara yuga yuga dhare abasthana karabe [1].
78|24|Sekhane tara asbadana karabe na sitalata, na kono paniya
78|25|phutanta pani o pumja chara [1]
78|26|Eta'i upayukta pratiphala [1].
78|27|Niscaya tara kakhano hisebera asa karata na
78|28|ara tara amadera nidarsanabalite kathorabhabe mithyaropa karechila [1].
78|29|Ara sabakichu'i amara sanraksana karechi likhitabhabe.
78|30|Atahpara tomara asbada grahana kara, amara to tomadera sasti'i sudhu brd'dhi karaba.
78|31|Niscaya muttakidera jan'ya ache saphalya
78|32|udyanasamuha, angurasamuha
78|33|ara samabayaska [1] udbhinna yaubana taruni
78|34|ebam paripurna panipatra.
78|35|Sekhane tara sunabe na kono asara o mithya bakya [1]
78|36|apanara rabera paksa theke puraskara, yathocita danasbarupa [1]
78|37|yini asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, dayamaya; tamra kache abedana-nibedanera sakti tadera thakabe na [1].
78|38|Sedina ruh o pheresatagana saribad'dhabhabe damrabe [1]; sedina ke'u katha balabe na, tabe ‘rahamana’ yake anumati debena se chara ebam se sathika katha balabe [2].
78|39|E dinati satya; ata'eba, yara icche se tara rabera nikata asraya grahana karuka.
78|40|Niscaya amara tomaderake asanna sasti samparke satarka karalama; yedina manusa tara krtakarma dekhate pabe ebam kaphira balabe, ‘haya! Ami yadi mati hatama [1]!’
79|1|Sapatha [1] nirmamabhabe utpatanakaridera [2]
79|2|ara mrdubhabe bandhanamuktakaridera [1]
79|3|ara tibra gatite santaranakaridera [1]
79|4|ara drutabege agrasaramanadera [1]
79|5|atahpara saba kaja nirbahakaridera [1].
79|6|Sedina prakampitakari prakampita karabe
79|7|take anusarana karabe parabarti kampanakari [1]
79|8|aneka hrdaya sedina santrasta habe [1]
79|9|tadera drstisamuha bhiti-bihbalataya nata habe.
79|10|Tara bale, ‘amara ki agera abasthaya phire yaba'i
79|11|curnabicurna asthite parinata ha'oyara para'o?’
79|12|Tara bale, ‘ta'i yadi haya tabe to eta eka sarbanasa pratyabartana.’
79|13|E to sudhu eka bikata a'oyaja [1]
79|14|takhana'i mayadane [1] tadera abirbhaba habe.
79|15|Apanara kache musara brttanta paumcheche ki [1]
79|16|Yakhana tamra raba pabitra upatyaka ‘tu'oya’ya tamke deke balechilena
79|17|‘phira‘a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche,’
79|18|atahpara baluna, ‘tomara ki agraha ache ye, tumi pabitra ha'o—
79|19|‘ara ami tomake tomara rabera dike pathapradarsana kari, yate tumi tamke bhaya kara?’
79|20|Atahpara tini take mahanidarsana dekhalena [1].
79|21|Kintu se mithyaropa karala ebam abadhya hala.
79|22|Tarapara se pichane phire pratibidhane sacesta hala [1].
79|23|Atahpara se sakalake samabeta kare ghosana dila
79|24|atahpara balala, ‘ami'i tomadera sarbocca raba.’
79|25|Atahpara allah take akherate o duniyaya kathina sastite pakara'o karalena [1].
79|26|Niscaya ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya to ete siksa rayeche.
79|27|Tomaderake [1] srsti kara kathina, na asamana srsti? Tini'i ta nirmana karechena [2]
79|28|tini era chadake su'ucca karechena o subin'yasta karechena.
79|29|Ara tini era ratake karechena andhakaracchanna ebam prakasa karechena era suryaloka
79|30|ara yaminake era para bistrta karechena [1].
79|31|Tini ta theke bera karechena tara pani o trnabhumi
79|32|ara parbatake tini drrhabhabe prothita karechena
79|33|esaba tomadera o tomadera catuspada jantugulora bhogera jan'ya.
79|34|Atahpara yakhana mahasankata upasthita habe [1]
79|35|manusa ya kareche ta se sedina smarana karabe
79|36|ara prakasa kara habe jahannama darsakadera jan'ya
79|37|sutaram ye simalanghana kare
79|38|ebam duniyara jibanake agraadhikara deya.
79|39|Jahannama'i habe tara abasa [1].
79|40|Ara ye tara rabera abasthanake [1] bhaya kare ebam kuprabrtti hate nijake birata rakhe
79|41|jannata'i habe tara abasa.
79|42|Tara apanake jijnesa kare, ‘kiyamata samparke, ta kakhana ghatabe?’
79|43|Ta alocanara ki jnana apanara ache
79|44|era parama jnana apanara rabera'i kache [1]
79|45|ye etara bhaya rakhe apani sudhu tara satarkakari.
79|46|Yedina tara ta dekhate pabe sedina tadera mane habe yena tara duniyaya matra eka sandhya athaba eka prabhata abasthana kareche [1]
80|1|Tini bhrakuncita karalena ebam mukha phiriye nilena [1]
80|2|karana tamra kache andha lokati asala.
80|3|Ara kise apanake janabe ye, --- se hayata parisud'dha hata
80|4|athaba upadesa grahana karata, phale se upadesa tara upakare asata [1].
80|5|Ara ye paroya kare na
80|6|apani tara prati manoyoga diyechena.
80|7|Athaca se nije parisud'dha na hale apanara kono dayitba ne'i
80|8|aparadike ye apanara kache chute elo
80|9|ara se sasankacitta
80|10|apani tara theke udasina halena
80|11|kakhano naya, eta to upadesa bani [1]
80|12|kaje'i ye icche karabe se eta smarana rakhabe
80|13|eta ache maryada sampanna lipisamuhe
80|14|ya unnata, pabitra [1]
80|15|lekhaka ba dutadera hate [1].
80|16|(Yara) mahasam'manita o nekakara.
80|17|Manusa dhbansa hoka! Se kata akrtajna [1]
80|18|tini take kona bastu theke srsti karechena
80|19|sukrabindu theke, tini take srsti karena, pare tara parimita bikasa sadhana karena [1]
80|20|tarapara tara jan'ya patha sahaja kare dena [1]
80|21|erapara tara mrtyu ghatana ebam take kabarastha karena.
80|22|Erapara yakhana icche tini take punarjibita karabena [1].
80|23|Kakhano naya, tini take ya adesa karechena, se ekhano ta purna kareni.
80|24|Atahpara manusa yena tara khadyera prati laksya kare [1]
80|25|niscaya amara pracura bari barsana kari
80|26|tarapara amara yaminake yathayathabhabe bidirna kari
80|27|atahpara tate amara utpanna kari sasya
80|28|angura, saka-sabji
80|29|yayatuna, khejuragacha
80|30|aneka gachabisista udyana
80|31|phala ebam gabadi khadya [1]
80|32|egulo tomadera o tomadera catuspada jantudera bhogera jan'ya [1].
80|33|Atahpara yakhana tiksna a'oyaja asabe [1]
80|34|sedina manusa paliye yabe tara bha'iyera kacha theke
80|35|ebam tara mata, tara pita
80|36|tara patni o tara santana theke [1]
80|37|sedina tadera pratyekera habe emana gurutara abastha ya take sampurnarupe byasta rakhabe [1].
80|38|Aneka cehara sedina habe ujjbala
80|39|sahasya o praphulla
80|40|ara aneka cehara sedina habe dhulidhusara
80|41|Seguloke acchanna karabe kalima.
80|42|Era'i kaphira o papacari.

81|22|Ara tomadera sathi unmada nana [1]
81|23|tini to take spasta digante dekhechena [1]
81|24|tini gayebi bisaya samparke krpana naya [1].
81|25|Ara eta kono abhisapta sayatanera bakya naya.
81|26|Kaje'i tomara kothaya yaccha
81|27|e to sudhu srstikulera jan'ya upadesa
81|28|tomadera madhye ye sarala pathe calate caya, tara jan'ya [1].
81|29|Ara tomara icche karate para na, yadi na srstikulera raba allah icche karena [1].

82|18|tarapara bali, kise apanake janabe: Pratidana dibasa ki
82|19|sedina ke'u kara'o jan'ya kichu karara malika habe na; ara sedina saba bisayera kartrtba habe allahara [1].

83|5|mahadine
83|6|yedina damrabe samasta manusa srstikulera rabera samane [1]

83|9|cihnita amalanama [1].

83|11|yara pratidana dibase mithyaropa kare

83|27|Ara tara misrana habe tasnimera [1]
